That is to show that the channel is not affiliated with Microsoft, whereas #ubuntu is an official Ubuntu channel.

You are on an irc network, freenode, which contains many support channels. Currently you are in the #ubuntu channel on freenode, if you type "/join ##windows" you will join the windows support channel on freenode.
